My Work

The Stranger Things Light Wall

This is by far one of my favorite projects. This project was built at a MLH (Major League Hacking) event at Kent State University. Working with a friend from school we built a working "light wall" from the Netflix original series Stranger Things. The light wall has 26 individualy assigned LED lights connected to a micro computer that host a local website we built using javascript/node.js stack. The user can then visit the website and enter a string of text that after submitted will then display on the wall by the blinking lights.
